QueryResult.text: SELECT CTX.CONTEXT_ID, CTX.CONTEXT_TYPE, CTX.WATERLINE_MARK, RANK.INSTANCE_ID, RANK.RANK , CASE WHEN WATERLINE_MARK = 1 THEN 0 WHEN WATERLINE_MARK = -1 THEN 1 WHEN RANK < WATERLINE_MARK THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ABOVE_WATERLINE FROM CMN_RANK_CONTEXTS CTX, CMN_INSTANCE_RANK RANK WHERE RANK.CONTEXT_ID = CTX.ID AND CTX.CONTEXT_TYPE = 'pfm'
